item.title: Added Web3forms
item.description: https://web3forms.com - Contact forms for Static & JAMStack Websites without writing backend code. Free plan allows Unlimited Forms, Unlimited Domains & 250 Submissions per month.

item.title: Formspree no longer requires exposing your email
item.description: https://formspree.io/ - Send email using an HTTP POST request. Free tier limits to 50 submissions per form per month.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://erratic.host - — 1.5 GB storage, unlimited bandwidth, PHP 8, DNS Manager, cPanel, Software Installer, E-Mail Accounts. Run your own website without any questions

item.title: Updated postale.io entry
item.description: https://postale.io/) — Free domain email addresses for up to 2 users per domain, one domain (per account - Free domain email addresses for up to 2 users per domain, one domain (per account), POP3/IMAP enabled, no ads

item.title: FunREtro is now EasyRetro
item.description: https://www.easyretro.io/ - Free simple and intuitive sprint retrospective tool

item.title: Added testtls.com
item.description: https://testtls.com - Test a SSL/TLS service for secure server configuration, certificates, chains etc. Not limited to HTTPS.

item.title: Added unixtime API
item.description: https://unixtime.co.za - Free API to convert Unixtime to DateTime and vice versa.

item.title: Revert "Add mailbluster"
item.description: https://simplelogin.io/) – Open source, self-hostable email alias/forwarding solution. Free 5 Aliases, unlimited bandwith, unlimited reply/send. Free for educational staffs (student, researcher, etc - Open source, self-hostable email alias/forwarding solution. Free 5 Aliases, unlimited bandwith, unlimited reply/send. Free for educational staffs (student, researcher, etc).
